entry.sdesc: input directory for time-series generator time-slice history files
entry.ldesc: Root directory where component time-slice history files are located for the time-series generator to read.

entry.sdesc: output directory for time-series generator variable time-series files
entry.ldesc: Root directory where component variable time-series history files are located that are output by the time-series generator.

entry.sdesc: Time-slice history file input date/time format mask for the time-series generator
entry.ldesc: The variable time-series generator expects the input time-slice history file names to follow the most current CESM output filename requirements and conventions including the use of a date/time mask as part of the filename.

entry.sdesc: Variable time-series generator output file date/mask format.
entry.ldesc: The variable time-series generator outputs files that correspond to the current CESM output filename requirements and conventions including the use of a date/time mask as part of the filename.
